title: [NLL] yield-in-box.rs test ICEs

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

milestone.title: NLL: Valid code works
milestone.description: Fix all known ICEs or other cases where code that *ought* to compile does not

body:
```
$ RUST_BACKTRACE=full rustc +stage1 src/test/run-pass/generator/yield-in-box.rs -Znll -Zborrowck=mir -Ztwo-phase-borrows
error: internal compiler error: librustc_mir/borrow_check/nll/universal_regions.rs:805: cannot convert `ReScope(Node(ItemLocalId(37)))` to a region vid

note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug.

note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#bug-reports

note: rustc 1.25.0-dev running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu

note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` for a backtrace
```
